prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Promptbook is an ecosystem of projects and tools for writing AI applications in plain human language, aiming to revolutionize software development by making it understandable and executable by both humans and machines.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, ecosystem, AI applications, plain human language, software development, revolutionize, executable, humans, machines
